column5: I'm looking for a place to go with my girlfriend and our two young children, a few other families may tag along as well.  I'd like somewhere with decent fishing, a nice beach, small playground.  I live in North Bay, so I would like to go somewhere other than Lake Nipissing.  Thanks Mike

I am a seasonal trailer parker at http://www.whitebirchescamp.com/ it has everything that you need and is fairly close to you. It has fishing,beaches.activities that you would need for the wife and kids plus " I " know where the fish are.  vance
Have you considered the Redneck Riviera?  http://everything2.com/e2node/Redneck%2520Riviera  It's real nice y'all!!!
hey mike,  check out goldeneaglecamp.com it would be fairly close for you and seems to have everything that you are looking for.  if ya like it and have any questions just shoot me a pm.  jason
